001.prompt: a valley where lightning is frozen in midair, illuminating the terrain eternally, silhouette in unnatural lighting, distorted horizon, angled underwater perspective, camera tilted, subject half-in frame, taking selfie from tilted camera, not facing directly, subject shown through uneven mirror shards, overlapping layers, scattered, intense lens flare from unnatural light source,

scenes.text:
なぜ
“いい人止まり”
で終わるのか？

002.prompt: ethereal deer glowing faintly, walking through solid objects without resistance, scene viewed through a small hole or tunnel, warped edges, angled view through a broken side window, subject offset and cropped, running motion along slanted ground, angled frame, off-center, horizon twisted, sky blends into floor, subject falling diagonally, lighting from two contradictory directions,

scenes.text: 優しさは恋愛の“決定打”にならない
人間関係には「交換的関係」と
